jx.jx_en_mean: To set apart from a group

lj.lj_ly: hived off the department into another division.

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly Brit.)(especially in business) separate something from a larger group or organization, especially from public to private ownership
jx.jx_cn_mean: (主英)（尤指生意）划分出来，分离出来（尤指从公有变为私有）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hȳf, of Germanic origin

encyclopedia.content: hive是基于Hadoop的一个数据仓库工具，可以将结构化的数据文件映射为一张数据库表，并提供完整的sql查询功能，可以将sql语句转换为MapReduce任务进行运行。 其优点是学习成本低，可以通过类SQL语句快速实现简单的MapReduce统计，不必开发专门的MapReduce应用，十分适合数据仓库的统计分析。另外一个是Windows注册表文件。

entry.def: A hive is a structure in which bees are kept, which is designed so that the beekeeper can collect the honey that they produce.

entry.tran: 熙熙攘攘的场所;人群忙碌的地方
entry.def: If you describe a place as a hive of activity, you approve of the fact that there is a lot of activity there or that people are busy working there.

example.ex: In the morning the house was a hive of activity...
example.tran: 早上，房子里一片繁忙景象。

example.ex: Stuart Tannahill's shed is a veritable hive of photographic creativity.
example.tran: 斯图尔特·坦纳希尔的小屋是个名副其实的摄影创意中心。

entry.def: Hives is a condition in which patches of your skin become red and very uncomfortable and itchy.

means.word_mean: 把一部份分离出来；卖掉公司的一部分

sentences.en: Some of the firm’s operations have been hived off into a separate company.
sentences.cn: 公司的一些业务已分离出来，成立了一家独立公司。
